name: Chimp Want Banana
description:
Chimp Want Banana!

Thanks for checking my submission for the Brackey's Game Jam 5, and my second game jam!

Help out the chimps in their search for bananas through puzzle levels to get the chimps closer to bananas. The  group of chimps will help each other throughout puzzles they can only get with teamwork. Stronger Together! 

Controls: WAD to Move, 123 to pick a chimp, R to restart level

Game Developed by Connor Pagtakhan

Original Music by Brandon Pagtakhan
